nodes.text: Woz Kaza was a male Gossam who was as an Ambassador for the Galactic Senate before its dissolution. He then became a smuggler early in the Galactic Civil War. He negotiated with Ileris Tik'kla for weapons, but betrayed her. Tik'kla was able to get Kaza's family diverted away from the Empire and walked out of the meeting.
Woz Kaza appears in the opening story in Fantasy Flight Games' 2015 roleplaying game sourcebook Desperate Allies.
